metadata.name: Pepestein AR
metadata.description:
It is a 5118 x 6549 Augmented Reality NFT. 3d modelled pepe is used to create the most iconic image of Einstein writing on the black board. So (Pepe+Einstein) is Pepestein. This Pepestein was finally rendered into an image.

It is actually an augmented reality nft, so the owner of this NFT will be able to own the 3d modelled pepestein in glb format from the "HASH" printed in the image. It doesn't require any application to simulate the augmented reality. Just scan the Qrcode and open the url which starts the web version of AR app which can be used to scan the Pepestein image to simulate the augmented reality of the animated Pepestein.

Items included:
1) Pepestein rendered image
2) Pepestein 3d model
